extendedInfo.description: "Shopping list" is an application that helps you organize, share with others, and manage your shopping or grocery lists using your phone. Easily add new items you need to buy, set quantity, and pick a category.When organizing your products, you can add prices, pictures and barcodes to items you need to buy!In store, just open your list and tick off every item you bought. Depending on your preferences, items are marked as "bought", moved to the end of the list or deleted from list.Synchronize your Shopping list with another person. Let one person enter shopping items on one phone, and see them appear on another one! Coordinated shopping at its peak! If the other person has not installed this app, you can send your list via text message or email.Advanced features to enhance your trip to purchase groceries like management of items with same name across different lists from one place and more...Highlights:* Categories* Instant synchronization between two phones* Barcode scanner* Remembers what you put on list once, reuse it again* Backup and restore your data* Many customizing possibilities* App design for quick manipulationRequired permissions:* SD card access is used to allow you to backup your shopping lists, products and preferences.* Internet access is used for synchronizing with other users.

reviews.title: Totally awesome
reviews.comment: Really good clear helpful thanks guys so great love it.
reviews.author: Bina C

reviews.title: Clear and Attractive - Intuitive
reviews.comment: Have tried several, and this is the best.   Very easy, including ability to sync with wife\'s device.
reviews.author: Benjamin H. Craine

reviews.title: Works well but adult themed ads are embarrassing
reviews.comment: I don\'t appreciate the Nudie pictures that are coming up on the top ad bar. I wanted to recommend the app to my friends but I won\'t with those embarrassing ads there. I can\'t even share the shopping list with my children. Choose your sponsors well or no matterhow good the app works I\'ll still un install.
reviews.author: Deanna Lau

reviews.title: Very useful
reviews.comment: Use this to keep shopping list synchronized with my wife\'s phone. Works well.
reviews.author: Michael Johnson

reviews.title: Like color coding
reviews.comment: Works well. I really like the color coding & categories. Lots of options but I wish I could control the look of the main lists.  Good customer support too. I\'d love to support but 4$ is high vs competition.  Sale?  :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great functionality. Syncs up with my other devices seemlessly. Im not a big fan of the look but I care more about functionality.
reviews.author: Jon Acker

reviews.comment: I am very comfortable with this app. It is simple and sufficient for maintaining shopping list :-)\tSimple and sufficient for shopping purpose
reviews.author: Priyanka Tammireddy

reviews.comment: Excellent shopping list...  a brief notes field to input size or quantity of a bottle purchased. eg. 308g or 1litre bottle; also a comparison between lists eg almonds; 1bag; 350g; $2 but in another list almonds; 1container; 500g; $2.25;  system could provide comparison and unit price
reviews.author: Kelvin Johnson

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: I\'ve used for a year now and it works great. Easy, remembers items & syncs with my husbands phone. One wish...that bought items could go to a pantry list so i know what i have already @home. Thanks for the great app!
reviews.author: h dragoo

reviews.title: Very nifty app!
reviews.comment: Super handy way to keep track of shopping lists! Since you can sync over a server it doesn\'t matter who in the household goes to the store!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent shopping list
reviews.comment: Using it for several months now and finding it to be the best one yet. My family is split on smart phones with some android and some apple. I wish there was an iPhone version so we could share across platforms. That would earn the fifth star.
reviews.author: Bill Chollett

reviews.title: Very nice
reviews.comment: Very cool. I can sync the list of things I need with my wife and whom ever gets to the shop can see what the other person needs too!
reviews.author: Clinton Ashworth

reviews.title: Really really good
reviews.comment: This is the best shopping list I have found by far. Easy to configure and easier to use. Highly recommended
reviews.author: Richard Stephens

reviews.title: Works
reviews.comment: It works good if I\'m shopping not so good if my wife is with me lol. She can\'t stick to a list to save her life!
reviews.author: Kevin Cooley

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Allows my wife and I to add to the list so I do not forget the things she wants. A must for any man wanting a quite life
reviews.author: Nick Barton

reviews.title: Brill
reviews.comment: The nearest I have found to Shopshop for iPhone, easy to use, exactly what I was looking for.
reviews.author: Lesley Kilgallon

reviews.title: Very Useful
reviews.comment: Like most things, you need to do some ground work to get this working well, but once this is done it is an excellent system for preparing to shop. If I can just persuade Angela of this and get her to use it.
reviews.author: Fraser James

reviews.title: Record keeper
reviews.comment: This is a great application keeping track of everything . I\'ve had no problems adding and deleting anything, keep up the good work.
reviews.author: Mark Schroeder

reviews.title: Synching not working properly
reviews.comment: Stuff deleted by one user shows up again after sync etc
reviews.author: Christoph Haug

reviews.title: Working like a charm
reviews.comment: At this point the only thing I would add is a built-in calculator. That would make it easier to get individual prices when items come packaged in multiple containers.
reviews.author: Arnold Davis
